channel.title: Procfs on Brice Dutheil

item.title: Off-Heap memory reconnaissance
item.author: brice.dutheil@gmail.com (Brice Dutheil)
item.description: Understand the RSS of a JVM leveraging the horsepower underneath ps with the help of one or two JVM diagnostic command.

item.title: Reads network addresses in /proc
item.author: brice.dutheil@gmail.com (Brice Dutheil)
item.description: If you happen to be on a read-only container that doesnâ€™t have the usual network utilities, like netstat, ss (socket stat), lsof, etc. then your only option is to leverage procfs, however, procfs displays some data in hexadecimal.
